Issue_Detail: API or Data hub sync failure between source and target systems
Business_Impact: Data latency leading to stale reporting and delayed decision-making
Resolution_Path: Restart Integration Services / Check API Authentication

Issue_Detail: SSO or Login authentication failure preventing workspace entry
Business_Impact: Total productivity loss for affected users during critical cycles
Resolution_Path: Verify Okta/Azure AD status or Reset User Permissions

Issue_Detail: ALM mismatch where Prod is running an outdated model build
Business_Impact: Calculation inconsistencies between Development and Production
Resolution_Path: Perform Model Synchronization via ALM Tools

Issue_Detail: User requires step-by-step guidance to navigate input templates
Business_Impact: Increased support ticket volume and slower planning cycle
Resolution_Path: Provide SOP Documentation or 1-on-1 Training Session

Issue_Detail: System-side mapping table corruption or missing technical dimensions
Business_Impact: Structural data gaps where new entities are not recognized
Resolution_Path: Rebuild Backend Mapping Tables / Refresh Metadata

Issue_Detail: Business mapping details not provided for newly created entities
Business_Impact: Data flows into 'Unmapped' buckets, requiring manual re-work
Resolution_Path: Request Mapping Logic from Business Process Owner

Issue_Detail: Master data updates submitted after the official processing cutoff
Business_Impact: Reporting delays and potential breach of external SLAs
Resolution_Path: Enforce Cutoff Policy / Escalate to Finance Leadership

Issue_Detail: Calculation methodology changed by business during live planning
Business_Impact: High risk of formula errors and loss of audit trail integrity
Resolution_Path: Initiate Formal Change Request / Impact Analysis

Category: User - Master data incorporation in system
Issue_Detail: Ad-hoc request to add new entities or reorganize hierarchies
Business_Impact: Strains maintenance resources; requires model structural updates
Resolution_Path: Add New Dimension Members to Model / Update Hierarchies

Issue_Detail: Incorrect system usage due to lack of familiarity with features
Business_Impact: Poor tool adoption and high frequency of user-generated errors
Resolution_Path: Enroll User in Platform Certification / Refresher Course

Category: User - Logic mistakes in excel vs system
Issue_Detail: Variance between offline Excel prep files and validated system results
Business_Impact: Loss of trust in the 'Single Source of Truth' system data
Resolution_Path: Reconcile Excel Formulas against System Logic

Category: User - Multiple versions issue in excel
Issue_Detail: User uploaded data from an outdated or deprecated spreadsheet
Business_Impact: Overwriting of accurate data with stale/incorrect values
Resolution_Path: Implement Version Locking / Mandatory Template Downloads
